newsitem.title: FINLAND: FINLAND BANK MAR DAILY LIQUIDITY NEED FIM 4.45 BLN.
newsitem.headline: FINLAND BANK MAR DAILY LIQUIDITY NEED FIM 4.45 BLN.

text.p: The Bank of Finland said on
Monday the required daily money market liquidity balance for the
rest of the month was 4.45 billion markka.
The central bank gave the following figures (FIM mln):
Required daily balance for remaining period 3,733
